str2: And there, and yonder, there also. From kai and ekei; likewise in that place.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From eu and aggelos; to announce good news especially the gospel.
